pricing.description: Essential budgeting tools, weekly spending tracker, and one savings goal.
Unlimited budgets, multiple savings buckets, monthly summaries, and debt payoff tracking.
Unlimited budgets, multiple savings buckets, monthly summaries, and debt payoff tracking.
Everything in Basic+, plus exportable reports, smart alerts, and personalized goal recommendations.
Everything in Pro, plus shared budgets, category insights, and custom savings challenges.
Everything in Premium, plus advanced forecasting, annual planning, and priority support.

features.title: Weekly Budget Tracker
features.description: Track weekly income and spending with simple visuals.

features.title: Retirement Planning
features.description: Set long-term savings goals, track retirement contributions, and monitor projected growth toward financial independence.

features.title: Savings Goals
features.description: Create and monitor savings buckets like Roth IRA and emergency fund.

features.title: Debt Payoff
features.description: Track loan balances and payoff progress.
